tool_description: Get live prices and other useful data for 10,000+ cryptocurrencies.
name: Cryptocurrency Prices
title: Cryptocurrency Prices

api_list.name: listCryptos
api_list.description: List of all details about all cryptocurrencies in our database.  The example response is limited to 100 cryptos due to the size of the data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-prices2.p.rapidapi.com/list.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-prices2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: livePrices
api_list.description: Get the live prices of all cryptocurrencies in our database.  The example response is limited to 100 cryptos due to the size of the data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cryptocurrency-prices2.p.rapidapi.com/prices.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cryptocurrency-prices2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
